ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿OFFICIAL L a 3 DOCUMENTS STATUTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee under Section 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Loan (Urban Development and Local Governance Program) to the Republic of Tunisia The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank extends to the Republic of Tunisia a loan in an amount equivalent to EUR217,000,000. The objectives of said loan are: (i) to strengthen Local Governments' performance to deliver municipal infrastructure; and (ii) to improve access to services in targeted disadvantaged neighborhoods. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to extend such a loan, and of the purposes to which the proceeds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the Program toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be applied comes within the objectives of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said Program is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of the Republic of Tunisia and is in the interest of the Republic of Tunisia and of the members of the Bank as a whole.
ï»¿Republic of Tunisia - 2 - Urban Development and Local Governance Program 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said Program merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends said Program for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group G eral Counsel Expert Select by Governor for Republic of Tunisia R ional Vic resident Middle East and rth Africa Dated a ashington, D.C
